type: Tutorial Step - Save It Once More!

definition.text: We're done! This is as far as we'll go before submitting your profile. Now let's make sure you save it before we proceed.

translations.text: ¡Terminamos! Hasta aquí llegaremos antes de enviar su perfil. Ahora asegurémonos de guardarlo antes de continuar.

paragraphs.text: Hit Ctrl + Shift + Alt + Key-S to save your User Profile one last time!

translations.text: Presiona Ctrl + Shift + Alt + Key-S para guardar tu User Profile por última vez!

paragraphs.text: No harm in checking the file saved correctly, right? A file with your Github username and .json extension should exist in the below path!

translations.text: No harm in checking the file saved correctly, right? A file with your Github username and.json extension should exist in the below path!
